relation.text: set out of Bath on Tuesday
a week , in a serious , or quiet tête à tête & another in the midst of a circle of 20 People -- I have been gravely playi n g at Whist & cribbagge , & then laughi
had been kept awake in torture so many nights
a few Days ago , fairly well -- v astly better than she was -- but I much fear
dies -- Mr Digby is not in Town nor have I seen him since June
hear -- Ly Lucy has been extremely ill , but is now
will be here for New Year
remember me very kindly -- To Mrs Dickenson Courteen Hall Northamton Honble . Miſs Gunning Decbr . 1786
